statements: SELECT * FROM traffic_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT location_id, vehicle_count FROM traffic_data WHERE congestion_level = 'high';
SELECT * FROM traffic_data WHERE location_id = 10 AND vehicle_count > 100 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT location_id, congestion_level FROM traffic_data WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM traffic_data;
SELECT location_id, timestamp, vehicle_count, congestion_level FROM traffic_data WHERE vehicle_count > 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT location_id, vehicle_count FROM traffic_data WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' AND congestion_level = 'High' ORDER BY vehicle_count ASC;
SELECT timestamp, vehicle_count FROM traffic_data WHERE congestion_level IN ('Low', 'Medium') ORDER BY timestamp ASC, vehicle_count DESC;
SELECT location_id, COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM traffic_data GROUP BY location_id HAVING total_records > 5 ORDER BY total_records DESC;

SELECT location_id, congestion_level, AVG(vehicle_count) AS avg_vehicle_count FROM traffic_data GROUP BY location_id, congestion_level HAVING avg_vehicle_count > 50 ORDER BY location_id ASC, avg_vehicle_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM TrafficData WHERE location = 'XYZ' ORDER BY date DESC, time ASC;
SELECT location, vehicle_count FROM TrafficData WHERE speed >= 60 ORDER BY vehicle_count DESC;
SELECT date, time, location, speed FROM TrafficData WHERE vehicle_count > 100 AND speed < 40;
SELECT * FROM TrafficData WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' AND location = 'ABC';
SELECT location, congestion_level FROM CongestionPatterns WHERE suggested_action = 'Reduce Speed' ORDER BY congestion_level DESC;
SELECT * FROM TrafficData WHERE vehicle_count > 100 ORDER BY date DESC, time ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT location, vehicle_count, speed FROM TrafficData WHERE speed > 50 AND vehicle_count < 50 ORDER BY location ASC, speed DESC;
SELECT location, vehicle_count, speed FROM TrafficData WHERE date = '2022-10-15' AND time BETWEEN '08:00:00' AND '18:00:00';
SELECT * FROM CongestionPatterns WHERE congestion_level > 3 ORDER BY congestion_time ASC;
SELECT location, congestion_level, suggested_action FROM CongestionPatterns WHERE suggested_action LIKE '%follow detour%' ORDER BY congestion_level DESC, location ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM congestion_patterns;
SELECT location, congestion_level FROM congestion_patterns WHERE congestion_level > 5;
SELECT id, location, congestion_level FROM congestion_patterns WHERE date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM traffic_incidents WHERE incident_type = 'Accident' ORDER BY incident_time DESC;
SELECT route_name, average_speed FROM transportation_efficiency WHERE traffic_lights_count < 5 ORDER BY average_speed DESC;
SELECT * FROM congestion_patterns ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT location, congestion_level FROM congestion_patterns WHERE congestion_level > 3 ORDER BY congestion_level DESC;
SELECT location, date FROM congestion_patterns WHERE congestion_level > 2 AND location LIKE 'New%' ORDER BY date ASC;
SELECT * FROM traffic_incidents WHERE incident_type IN ('Accident', 'Road Closure') ORDER BY incident_time DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT route_name, average_speed, traffic_lights_count FROM transportation_efficiency ORDER BY average_speed DESC, traffic_lights_count ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM vehicles WHERE vehicle_make = 'Toyota';
SELECT vehicle_id, vehicle_make, vehicle_model FROM vehicles WHERE vehicle_year > 2015;
SELECT vehicle_id, vehicle_type, vehicle_make FROM vehicles ORDER BY vehicle_make DESC;
SELECT * FROM traffic_incidents WHERE incident_type = 'Accident' AND incident_location LIKE '%highway%';
SELECT report_id, report_date, report_time, report_author FROM traffic_reports ORDER BY report_date ASC, report_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM vehicles WHERE vehicle_make = 'Toyota';
SELECT vehicle_type, vehicle_model FROM vehicles WHERE vehicle_year > 2015 ORDER BY vehicle_year ASC;
SELECT COUNT(vehicle_id) AS total_vehicles, vehicle_make FROM vehicles GROUP BY vehicle_make;
SELECT * FROM traffic_lanes WHERE lane_type = 'Highway' ORDER BY lane_capacity DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT incident_id, incident_type, incident_location, DATE_FORMAT(incident_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS formatted_time FROM traffic_incidents WHERE incident_type = 'Accident';
SELECT * FROM traffic_data ORDER BY date_time DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT location, vehicle_count FROM traffic_data WHERE congestion_level='High';
SELECT road_name, road_length, road_type FROM road_network WHERE max_speed_limit > 50 ORDER BY road_length DESC;
SELECT * FROM weather_data WHERE temperature < 20 AND humidity > 70;
SELECT location, incident_type, description FROM traffic_incidents ORDER BY date_time ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM traffic_data WHERE vehicle_count > 100 ORDER BY date_time DESC;
SELECT location, vehicle_count FROM traffic_data WHERE congestion_level = 'High' ORDER BY vehicle_count DESC;
SELECT location, temperature, humidity FROM traffic_data JOIN weather_data ON traffic_data.date_time = weather_data.date_date WHERE temperature > 25;
SELECT road_name, road_length, max_speed_limit FROM road_network WHERE road_type = 'Highway' ORDER BY road_length DESC;
SELECT incident_id, date_time, location, incident_type FROM traffic_incidents WHERE incident_type = 'Accident' AND location = 'Intersection A' ORDER BY date_time ASC;
